title: What is a Faucet?
description: A Faucet is distributes a small amount of cryptocurrency in return for completing a few specified tasks.

title: What is the purpose of the Faucet?
description: The Faucet rewards users who complete its tasks with small incentives. These rewards are typically deposited into the user's wallet, and after reaching a certain limit, users can withdraw earned crypto to their own wallets.

title: What is TestNet MTC?
description: TestNet cryptos are a specialized type of cryptocurrency used exclusively for testing purposes. With these TestNet MTCs, new features and functionalities can be tested on the network without risking real MTCs. Similarly, they can be used to understand the operation of the MetaChain without exposing real MTC to risk.

title: Do TestNet MTCs have any value?
description: TestNet MTCs do not have real value. They are the only test tokens used within the MetaChain test network.

title: Can TestNet MTCs be exchanged for real MTCs?
description: TestNet MTCs cannot be exchanged for real MTCs.

title: Where can I find more information about Faucets?
description: You can read our blog post about Faucets by visiting our MetaBlog.
